reviews.author: Bruce
reviews.review: My wife and I were looking to purchase a home in the greater Bellingham and Mount Vernon, WA area. Michael Eisenberg was the clear choice for us to move forward with an agent after interviewing a couple Real Estate Professionals. When we

reviews.author: dale boe
reviews.review: We have known Michael for a number of years and he helped us close on the house we live in now. When you buy a home it can be very stressful and time consuming. Michael took that all away and made the whole process easy, he took care of

reviews.author: Dave Eckman
reviews.review: Michael was wonderful to work with when we sold our house in Bellingham. We live in Pt. Orchard so it was not that easy to get up to B'ham to work out all of the details. He was always quick to respond to our questions, to get important

reviews.author: David Mayer
reviews.review:
In the past few years Michael Eisenberg helped my family buy property in Bellingham (twice) and was just terrific as an agent and as a person. He is very diligent and professional and a great detail follower, honest and kind.
I highly recommend him as your real estate agent (and Friend::::) .

reviews.author: Cheryl McGregor
reviews.review: My husband & I were fortunate to have Michael working with us when we were trying to sell  a  property  a few years ago. it was a difficult one to sell,but he managed to get us a buyer & we were able to sell it for a good price. Thanks again,Michael!  We appreciate all that you do!
